name: Jafar Muhtaram
story: Khalil was born in a small village in Iran. His father was a soldier for the Iranian military and was killed in a battle against insurgents when Khalil was only 10 years old. Since then, Khalil has felt a strong calling to serve his country and avenge his father's death. He joined the Iranian military at the age of 18 and quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural leadership abilities and fearless attitude. Now, as a recon demo specialist for the OPFOR faction in Arma 3, Khalil is a key player in the fight against enemy forces.
